pita pita waga kanna dahathunak sandaha rupiyal 350 kata pohora mallak laba di shri lankawa loka warthawak thaba atha.wasara 2005 sita me dakwa akhandawa rupiyal 350 ta pohora mallak labadima rajaya salakanuye wiyadamak lesa nowa anagatha aayojanayak lesa yayida , pohora sahanadharaya kappadu kirimata rajaye kisima sudanamak nathayida jathika pohora lekam karyalaya awadharanaya karayi.aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahathage pradhanathwayen eeye dahawal janadhipathi lekam karyalaye pawathi wishesha madhya hamuwedi me karunu anawaranaya wiya.wi gowithanata rajaya labadena pohora sahanadharaya sandaha awuruddakata rupiyal miliyana 34,560ka mudalak waya karayi.
